doc.title: Drop Gun
doc.plot: Martin Chapman, a known serial pedophile, escaped justice. Metro Police Detective Leyla Reynolds wants to put him away, and is willing to bend the rules to do it. Reynolds fixates on this pursuit, and, aided by her partner, Jack Davis starts down the slippery slope toward committing a criminal act herself. When a brutal assault on a friend of Reynolds leaves the girl hospitalized and near death, the pedophile and the cop come together for one final deadly confrontation. Enraged, Reynolds finds herself at the crossroads between justice and vengeance... With her finger on the trigger of a drop gun.
